body:
Hey there, I have a small question regarding some of the severe error that are shown on the "Run Energy Simulation" component (see the attached pictures). I manage to get results from my energy simulation, but I was wondering if the the severe errors will have any major influence on the simulation results, if left unsolved? 

And if so, any ideas how to solve them? Thanks for your help
topic: Severe Errors - Influence on the simulation results
